articles.description: Arsenal are facing competition from three Premier League sides in the race to sign Southampton midfielder Romeo Lavia. Transfer Talk has the latest.
articles.content: The summer transfer window is open for some leagues in Europe and there's plenty of gossip swirling around. Transfer Talk brings you all the latest buzz on rumours, comings, goings and, of course, do… [+3366 chars]
